items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, UPI, and other popular payment gateways. Cash on Delivery (COD) is currently available only for customers in Jaipur.

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Shipping typically takes 5â€“7 business days, depending on your location. You will receive tracking information once your order is dispatched.

items.question: Can I return a product if I am not satisfied?
items.answer: Yes, you can request a refund or exchange within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our Return Policy page for detailed information and instructions.

items.question: Do you offer international shipping?
items.answer: Currently, we ship only within the country. We are working on expanding our shipping options to include international deliveries in the near future.

items.question: Are the medicines sold on your website genuine and safe?
items.answer: Absolutely. We source all our medicines directly from licensed manufacturers and authorized distributors to ensure quality, safety, and authenticity.

items.question: Do I need a prescription to order medicines?
items.answer: For prescription medicines, a valid prescription from a registered medical practitioner is required at the time of order. Over-the-counter products can be purchased without a prescription.

items.question: How is my personal and medical information protected?
items.answer: We take your privacy seriously and use advanced encryption and security measures to protect your personal and medical information. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

items.question: Can I consult a pharmacist or medical expert through your site?
items.answer: Currently, we do not provide direct medical consultations. We recommend consulting your healthcare provider for personalized medical advice.
